high_descs: Turn left and go to the side of the nightstand.
Pick up the pillow on the bed.
Turn left and go to the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pillow with the light of the lamp.

high_descs: Turn left go forward to the space between the night stand and the desk, turn left.
Take the purple pillow from the bed.
Turn left, go forward to the dresser next to the door.
Turn the lamp on the dresser on.
anns.task_desc: Look at a purple pillow by a lit lamp.

high_descs: Go left to cross the room and then face the bed to the left.
Pick the purple pillow up from the bed.
Go left and cross the room to face the lamp on the small cabinet.
anns.task_desc: Pick a pillow up and turn a lamp on.
